name: Station Meltdown
description:
Please comment if you liked the game or have any feedback! 

Default controls:

[WASD] - Movement;

[Left Shift] - Dash;

[Left Mouse Button] - Fire;

[Right Mouse Button] - Melee;

[R] - Reload;

[Q] - Weapon Wheel;

[I] - Inspect weapon;

[Esc / Tab] - Pause Menu.

You can also download a standalone Windows and Android versions below!
